#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std ;
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,l,m,n,t,A[27],a[27],b[27],ans1,ans2 ;
	string s ;
	string as ;
	string bs ;
	cin >> t ;
	cin >> s ;
	for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
	{
		A[s.at(i)-96] = i ;
	}
	while(t--)
	{
		for(i=1 ;i<=26;i++)
		{
			a[i] = 0 ;
			b[i] = 0 ;
		}
		cin >> as ;
		for(i=0;i<as.length();i++)
			a[as.at(i)-96] += 1 ;

		cin >> bs ;
		for(i=0;i<bs.length();i++)
			b[bs.at(i)-96] += 1 ;
		
		ans1 = 0 ;
		ans2 = 0 ;
		for(i=1 ;i<=26;i++)
		{
			k = min(a[i],b[i]);
			a[i] = a[i] - k ;
			b[i] = b[i] - k ;
			if(a[i])
				ans1 = ans1 + A[i] ;
			if(b[i])
				ans2 = ans2 + A[i] ;
		}
		if(ans1 > ans2)
			printf("ALICE\n");
		else if(ans2 > ans1)
			printf("BOB\n") ;
		else
			printf("TIE\n") ;
	}
	return 0 ;
}
